title: [K-12] Critical Service Learning for Social Innovation Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Social Science Theories and Scientific Research Methodology
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, emphasizing interdisciplinary approaches to solving social issues in science fields.

learning_goals: Case analysis report applying the EDI (Equity, Diversity, Inclusion) framework for solving social issues

Select one local community issue (e.g., insufficient waste sorting, aging park facilities), conduct ≥5 surveys/observations to analyze root causes, propose ≥3 scientific solutions, and write a 5-page service project plan (including a timeline).
Proposal of sustainable social innovation solutions through power structure analysis

resources: EDI (Equity, Diversity, and Inclusion) assessment rubric
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
